citations.narrative:
The facility does not have medical records for a female Cavalier (microchip number 13881). The applicant stated that the
dog had received all required vaccinations but does not have a medical record documenting the vaccines or treatments
administered or the dates of administration. Failure to document all treatments and vaccinations administered to the dogs
restricts APHIS inspectors ability to determine compliance with the AWA and to ensure that the Attending Veterinarians
instructions are being followed. The facility must ensure that all vaccines and treatments administered and the dates of
administration are documented. Correct by, 18-December-2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(b) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility does not have medical records for a female Cavalier (microchip number 13881). The applicant stated that the 
dog had received all required vaccinations but does not have a medical record documenting the vaccines or treatments 
administered or the dates of administration. Failure to document all treatments and vaccinations administered to the dogs 
restricts APHIS inspectors ability to determine compliance with the AWA and to ensure that the Attending Veterinarians 
instructions are being followed. The facility must ensure that all vaccines and treatments administered and the dates of 
administration are documented. Correct by, 18-December-2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative. 
 
 n
